name: Treat Me Well
description:
Treat Me Well is a game where you form a deepening relationship with a treat-loving creature that lives inside of a well.

Fullscreen mode is recommended

Controls

Ascend - Mousewheel, Up arrow or W key

Descend - Mousewheel, Down arrow or S key

Dig - Left click

Credits

Jamey Stevenson - Design & code

Autumn Walters - Art

Katherine Greymour - Art

Amanda Laven - Music & sound

Developer Notes

Created for Ludum Dare 48. The theme of the jam was "Deeper and deeper."

We’ll be adding a story to the post-jam version of the game, but we didn’t have time to implement all the narrative content for the Ludum Dare build. Even so, we hope you still dig this version!
